biography.bio: Carlos Tristancho was born on May 3, 1955. He is known for his work on El Lute: Run for Your Life (1987), Villarriba y Villabajo (1994) and If They Tell You I Fell (1989).
biography.name: Carlos Tristancho

biography.bio: Álvaro de Luna was born on April 10, 1935 in Madrid, Spain as Álvaro de Luna Blanco. He is an actor, known for Curro Jiménez (1976), Carol's Journey (2002) and El prado de las estrellas (2007).
biography.name: Álvaro de Luna

biography.bio: Verónica Forqué was born on December 1, 1955 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Verónica Forqué Vázquez-Vigo. She is an actress, known for Kika (1993), Pepa y Pepe (1995) and No Shame (2001). She was previously married to Manuel Iborra.
biography.name: Verónica Forqué

biography.bio: Silvia Aguilar is an actress and art director, known for Night of the Werewolf (1981), Trampa sexual (1978) and But Aren't You Ever Going to Change, Margarita? (1978).
biography.name: Silvia Aguilar

biography.bio: Strikingly comely brunette Patty Shepard was born in 1945 in Greenville, South Carolina. The daughter of a U.S. Air Force official, Patty moved to Spain when she was only 18 years old. After becoming popular as a model in a series of TV commercials, the lovely Ms. Shepard embarked on an acting career, making her film debut in a small part in La ciudad no es para mí (1966) (aka "The City is Not for Me"). She initially acted in paella westerns and thrillers before appearing in a handful of horror movies which include Assignment Terror (1970) (aka "Dracula vs. Frankenstein"), The Werewolf Versus the Vampire Woman (1971) (aka "The Werewolf vs. the Vampire Woman"), Hannah, Queen of the Vampires (1973) (aka "Crypt of the Living Dead") and El monte de las brujas (1975) (aka "The Witches' Mountain") and Special Killers (1973) (aka "La Ragazza di Via Condotti"). Patty often acted alongside Spanish horror icon Paul Naschy in these films and projects a certain eerie otherworldly aura that's stunningly similar to Barbara Steele. Other films include the end-of-the-world science fiction feature Creation of the Damned (1974) (aka "Refuge of Fear") and the tongue-in-cheek spaghetti Western oddity Blood Money (1974) (aka "The Stranger and the Gunfighter"). After appearing in the horror movies Rest in Pieces (1987) (aka "Rest in Pieces") and Slugs (1988) (aka "Slugs"), Shepard retired from acting in the late 1980's. She died of a heart attack at her home in Madrid, Spain on January 3, 2013.
biography.name: Patty Shepard

biography.bio: Francisco Algora was born on December 7, 1948 in Madrid, Spain as Francisco Javier Jiménez Algora. He was an actor, known for Tiovivo c. 1950 (2004), Barrio (1998) and The Grandfather (1998). He died on March 30, 2016 in Puerto Real, Cádiz, Andalucía, Spain.
biography.name: Francisco Algora

biography.bio: Aitor Peña is an actor, known for Everybody Calls Me 'The Cat' (1980).
biography.name: Aitor Peña

biography.bio: Alberto Dalbés was born on April 3, 1922 in Rosario, Argentina as Francisco Eduardo Eyres Martínez. He was an actor, known for Night of the Assassins (1974), The Erotic Rites of Frankenstein (1973) and Cut-Throats Nine (1972). He died on September 14, 1983 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Alberto Dalbés

biography.bio: Antonio Gamero was born on March 2, 1934 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Antonio Gamero Aguirre. He was an actor and director, known for Manolito Four Eyes (1999), Madregilda (1993) and Furtivos (1975). He died on July 26, 2010 in Madrid.
biography.name: Antonio Gamero

biography.bio: Antonio Requena was born in 1933 in Granada, Granada, Andalucía, Spain. He is an actor, known for Pipas (1994), Madregilda (1993) and The Impatient Alchemist (2002).
biography.name: Antonio Requena

biography.bio: Manuel Ladrada is an actor, known for Everybody Calls Me 'The Cat' (1980).
biography.name: Manuel Ladrada

biography.bio: Julia Peña is an actress, known for A Brief Vacation (1973), The Garden of Delights (1970) and Honeycomb (1969).
biography.name: Julia Peña

biography.bio: Marciano Buendia is an actor, known for Kargus (1981), María, la santa (1977) and Otoño romántico (1973).
biography.name: Marciano Buendia

biography.bio: Enrique Menéndez is an actor, known for El hombre de rojo (1985), En route pour le palais (1999) and Santa Con (2014).
biography.name: Enrique Menéndez

biography.bio: José Luis Asunción is an actor, known for Everybody Calls Me 'The Cat' (1980), Margarita y el lobo (1969) and Cabo de vara (1978).
biography.name: José Luis Asunción
